text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
Ah...――
What a beautiful starry sky...――

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...It feels like I'm enveloped by the night and the sound of the waves.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ――...I wonder if you're feeling it too.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...I'm about to begin. My "journey."

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...I'm sure I'll walk a different path than you.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text:
I don't know what awaits me...
but...――

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: I'll enjoy it. As my heart desires.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: If I find "new gold" at the end of my journey... I'll come talk to you again.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: With lots of souvenir stories.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Well then, shall we go? To the starting place――
――The three years of challenging the Twinkle Series with Stay Gold were finally about to begin.
...They were about to begin, but――

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: So, Stay Gold-san's signature is still missing from the trainer contract.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: For the final registration procedures, the trainer contract is absolutely necessary, so I'd like you to handle it as soon as possible――

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: ...Trainer-san, you also don't know where Stay Gold-san is right now?
I was being asked by the chairman's secretary, Tazuna-san, about when the trainer contract with Stay Gold would be submitted.
...Stay Gold and I met on a journey, and that connection brought us together.
Stay Gold has solid potential as a racing umamusume. And on top of that――
She was a unique umamusume who possessed the memories of a "Stay Gold" from another world.
Thanks to Stay Gold's arrangement, I was able to catch a powerful glimpse of the hoofprints of that girl from another world, a part of them.
That's why I'm convinced that her "memories" are real—that they truly happened in another world.
And so, I signed a contract to become her trainer, to journey together with Stay Gold on a 'trip that would shatter all of the past.'
All to make Stay Gold's journey more interesting and to enjoy it together.
...But at this point, I hadn't gotten her signature on the contract paperwork.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: '——Well then, I guess I'll be off. Get the debut preparations ready while I'm gone.'
Stay Gold herself said that and went on a small trip as a pre-debut break. Who would have thought it would come back to haunt us now...!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: I understand the situation. I'll try to adjust things from my end to delay the submission a bit more——
——Oh~, there you are.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Hey. Sorry to keep you waiting.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: I've got souvenirs~. A wooden bear carving, a bone necklace that wards off evil, right? A scented pouch with a strange smell——
choice_data_list: I'm curious, but more importantly right now...!

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Huh? Ah~, right, right.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: ——Yes. I've confirmed the signature. I'll take it from here.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Whoops, my bad, my bad. I had no idea my signature was needed.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: So? Is there anything else I need to do?

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Yes. Since submitting this contract was the last step, the procedures are finally complete. I'm relieved too...!

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Great. Then, case closed——

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: I think I'll go for a little run, it's been a while.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Um, I'd like to explain the post-contract procedures after this...

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Ah, about that, you can hear it from her.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: --Well, see ya later~.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Ah, wait, Stay Gold-san...!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: She's gone...
choice_data_list: She really does things at her own pace...

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: ...But, it's that girl who chose you as her Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: That is something to be very happy about. The road ahead may be tough... but please do your best.
After receiving the explanation from Tazuna-san, I head to the training course to look for Stay Gold--

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: --Hmph!

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: --Haha...!
Stay Gold, running happily on the course. Her form, roughly cutting through the wind, is powerful and sharp, belying her small stature.
choice_data_list: (As I thought, she has amazing talent...!)

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: --Phew...! Running on the course really is the best, huh~.
choice_data_list: Stego! Sorry to keep you waiting

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Oh, you're here. Alrighty then--
choice_data_list: It's about the future, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Nah, it's about food.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: --Alright. Let's call it a day here~.
choice_data_list: W-wait, you mean we're going outside the academy...?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Places with a good view make it easier to see the path ahead. And the food tastes better too. It's all good.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Phew~, ate up, ate up.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...But anyway, about this 'future talk,' the guiding principle for our journey is already decided, right?
choice_data_list: ...'A new journey that destroys all of the past,' right?
...'A new journey that destroys all of the past,' right?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: That's right.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...In another world, I, at the end of that journey, grasped a unique, unparalleled gold.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: That dazzling memory remains within me even now, as an undying brilliance...

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...However, that is, after all, the gold that I from another world found.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: What's here now isn't mine.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: …………I want to find it, you know.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: The 'new journey that destroys all of the past' that lies ahead. At its end――

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ――――A 'new gold'.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: A gold that belongs only to the me of now.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ――And so, as a companion, you're gonna come along on this journey with me.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Who knows. Won't know unless we move forward.
We don't know where the final destination of the journey is. But we do know the direction we should go.
What's important is destroying all of the past journeys. In other words, you could also say it's about carving a different hoofprint from hers in another world.
Then, in order to find a 'new gold', what we should aim for with Stay Gold from now on is――
choice_data_list: Let's aim for the Classic races

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ……Huh.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: The me in another world did indeed run the 'Kikuka-shō'. ……Well, you couldn't exactly call it a good result, even to be polite.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: So first, we're gonna try to rewrite that one, is that it?
choice_data_list: No. Let's aim to run from the 'Satsuki-shō'!

text_block_list.text: The Classic races. They are a stage of tradition and glory that only the top-class Classic-level Umamusume can challenge.
Among them, there exists the grouping called the 'Classic Triple Crown', comprised of the three races: the 'Satsuki-shō', the 'Japanese Derby', and the 'Kikuka-shō'――
If we could run all of this Classic Triple Crown, if we could win them. That would undoubtedly be a new hoofprint different from hers in another world.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: All of them starting from the 'Satsuki-shō', huh. That's definitely the best way to smash the 'memories'.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: But still…… Heheh――

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: The me of now hasn't even debuted yet. And yet you're aiming for the Classics? That's pretty ambitious.
choice_data_list: I thought that would surely be more interesting

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Hahah! No doubt about it.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: ...Now that we've settled the matter, can I ask you for a favor?

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Yeah. My habit of leaning to the left. I want to fix this as soon as possible.

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Seems like I've had a lot of trouble with this... If we're aiming for the Classic races, we should take care of it, right?
choice_data_list: Got it, leave it to me...!

text_block_list.name: Stay Gold
text_block_list.text: Good, you're full of motivation. If we're traveling the same path, that's how it should be.
...And so, with our big goal and immediate challenge set, the preparations for the journey were complete.
——What kind of end will this journey with her, so free-spirited, lead to?
I'll definitely see it through. ...And enjoy it together.
With that renewed determination, the journey with Stay Gold began——
